products.title: Carnival Acacia
products.metadescription: Carnival acacia made to measure roller blind

products.title: Carnival Blackout Acacia
products.metadescription: Carnival blackout acacia made to measure roller blind

products.title: Acacia Black
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure acacia black standard roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality standard roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 200mm max width: 3000mm (1940mm fabric turned)
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 1690mm (3000mm fabric turned)
 	fabric joins: if the width is greater than 1940mm and the drop is greater than 1690mm, a horizontal join will be required positioned towards the top of the blind.
 	Fabric composition: polyester
 	tube: robust aluminium tube
 	control: sidewinder or spring control
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
